author: Sophie Dahl
method: Heat a large saucepan and pour in the boiling water. Add the sugar and let the mixture bubble for 30 seconds.    Add the plums, cinnamon sticks and star anise and simmer for 8-10 minutes.    Remove the plums, and simmer the sauce, stirring gently until it thickens, then pour over the plums and leave to cool slightly before serving.
ingredients: 300ml/½ pint boiling water,  150g/5½oz caster sugar,  500g/1lb 2oz plums, stones removed,  2 cinnamon sticks,  3-4 whole star anise
